name: 24 Hours (itch) (Holzycookie)
description:
Experience an average day in the life over the course of 24 hours. Waking up. Travelling. Working. Shopping. More travelling. Sleeping. A game that is played in real time over an entire day.

-

Controls

Left Click to interact with specific parts of the scenes.

M to mute/unmute the sound in game.

-

24 Hours was apart of a 12 week long, Game a Week course for university, where we were given a theme, and were tasked with making a game in 1 week. The theme was ‘Durational’, so I wanted to make a game that took an entire day to play. This game was made in the 5th week of the course.

The game is meant to be played over the course of an entire day, but you can also change the time on your computer manually, which also works as well, but you didn’t hear that from me *cough cough*.

All the artwork seen in game is made by myself.
